# I Smell Your Fear (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a sample of the targetâ€™s flesh, blood, hair, ectoplasm, or some other physical part)

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Area:** Circle, centered on you, with a radius of 400 ft. + 40 ft./level

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Ghostwalk (WotC), pg. 55

As *[[Locate Creature (Spell)|locate creature]]**,* except as noted above and below.
